name: Vaporwave World
description:
Hello, I like vaporwave art. I want to make a simple vaporwave game, so this game was made.

In this game you will be teleported to a flat world. Over time you will automatically get various types of building items. Where you build is your freedom. You can build them in the air or build them on the ground.

Game Features


  • Vaporwave world atmosphere.
  • Three art packs (Egypt, Roman, 1980s) help you create a personalized vaporwave world.
  • Customizable lighting.
  • Simple and relaxing game experience.
  • Buildings can be placed freely, in the air or on the ground.

Game Play


  • Create your own vaporwave world.
  • Increase the number of buildings over time.
